query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `notificationRules` (
  `id` INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  `name` VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,
  `description` TEXT,
  `triggerEvent` ENUM('novo_anexo', 'mudanca_pir_significativa', 'mudanca_pir_critica', 'meta_concluida', 'meta_atrasada', 'avaliacao_360_concluida', 'novo_feedback', 'competencia_atualizada', 'pdi_atualizado') NOT NULL,
  `conditions` TEXT NOT NULL,
  `pirChangeThreshold` INT,
  `pirChangeDirection` ENUM('qualquer', 'melhoria', 'declinio'),
  `notifyEmployee` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  `notifyDirectManager` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `notifyHR` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  `notifyCustomEmails` TEXT,
  `sendEmail` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `sendInApp` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `sendPush` BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE NOT NULL,
  `emailSubjectTemplate` VARCHAR(500),
  `emailBodyTemplate` TEXT,
  `inAppMessageTemplate` TEXT,
  `maxNotificationsPerDay` INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  `cooldownMinutes` INT DEFAULT 60 NOT NULL,
  `activeFrom` DATETIME,
  `activeUntil` DATETIME,
  `active` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
  `createdBy` INT NOT NULL,
  `createdAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  `updatedAt` TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
command:

  `maxNotificationsPerDay` INT DEFAULT 10 NOT NULL,
  `cooldownMinutes` INT DEFAULT 60 NOT NULL,
  `activeFrom` DATETIME,

  `active` BOOLEAN DEFAULT TRUE NOT NULL,
